text: Lesley Ann Warren (born August 16, 1946 in New York City) is an American movie and television actor. She starred in many television programs and movies. She was in Color of Night (which did poor at the box office). She also appeared on the television series Will & Grace and Desperate Housewives. ==References== Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:1946 births Category:Living people
title: Lesley Ann Warren
